edu.wmich.cs3310.hw4.Thompson.lists

Class LinkedList<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wmich.cs3310.hw4.Thompson.lists.LinkedList<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Generic Data Type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILinkedList<E>

    public class LinkedList<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILinkedList<E>
    Provides the LinkedList class for creating linked lists.
    Author:
    Tyler Thompson
